body.text: If library has no songs then handle the event.
Twitter search. An option to find who else is using broadcast on twitter.
Shake the phone to play a song.
Random - When the player is stopped.
Does nothing if a song is playing.
Shake functionality - Plays previous song if a song is playing. If paused and flipped left then song changes to previous one and plays.

This module will give an option to the user to select a mode like biking driving swimming etc and will add it to broadcast message. It will select random pics from web according to the mode for jukebox background.
